Tunable.name: RELATIONSHIP_SATISFACTION_TRACK
Tunable.description: A reference to the relationship track that represents relationship satisfaction.

TdescFragTag.name: SHOULD_TRACK_TESTS
TdescFragTag.description: If these tests fail for the given actor and target, we want to freeze relationship satisfaction and hide it. When the tests succeed, we want to show relationship satisfaction and allow it to decay. We do not add/remove relationship satisfaction itself from the actor and target. When this test is used, we automatically test both directions, so you only need to write the test for one direction.

Tunable.name: UNKNOWN_DESCRIPTION
Tunable.description: The description to use in the Sim Profile when the active sim does not know the relationship satisfaction that the target sim feels towards the active sim.

Tunable.name: UNKNOWN_ICON
Tunable.description: The icon to display in the Sim Profile when the active sim does not know the relationship satisfaction that the target sim feels towards the active sim.

Tunable.name: UNKNOWN_TITLE
Tunable.description: The title to use in the Sim Profile when the active sim does not know the relationship satisfaction that the target sim feels towards the active sim.
